caption:
POV: You switched your agency portfolio from Next.js to Astro and your Lighthouse score went from 64 to 100. üöÄ

Here is the harsh truth: You are shipping 200kB of JavaScript for a static landing page. Your client doesn't care about your 'complex state management'. They care about bounce rates.

We audited 50 agency sites. The ones built with Astro loaded 40% faster and converted 15% better. Stop over-engineering. Ship HTML. 

#astrojs #webperformance #webdesign #agencygrowth

The 'Perfect Grid' is dead. Long live the Bento. üç±

In 2025, users are craving density and authenticity. We are seeing a massive shift away from huge hero sections with vague copy. 

The new meta? Bento Grids that mix functional widgets, raw photography, and micro-interactions. It‚Äôs not just aesthetic; it's high-density information architecture. 

Swipe to see how we reorganized a SaaS dashboard using a modular Bento layout. Engagement went up 3x because users could find everything instantly. 

#uidesign #bentogrid #saasdesign #uiux2025 #productdesign

Stop coding your marketing site from scratch. Just stop. üõë

I challenged a senior React dev to build a landing page. I used Framer. He used VS Code.

Result:
Me: Done in 45 mins. Published. Animation perfect.
Him: Still configuring Tailwind config.

For SaaS products, speed is life. Framer isn't a 'no-code toy' anymore; it's the professional standard for shipping fast. If you are an agency not using this, you are burning margin.

#framer #nocode #webdesign #freelancetips #productivity
